bug.author: denity
bug.description: I think the line 234 in ‘service/server.py’, it should be self.logger.info(' %d is ready and listening' % self.worker_id) The current code will cause a type error by missing its string formatting symbol. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2181344/48760741-cc0cfc80-ece1-11e8-88ae-6de446b1fd01.png></denchmark-link>
